title: HOCILLE Women's Sexy Strapless Tube Top Bodycon Sleeveless Ruffle Mini Party Dress
description: The sexy tube top dress is made of double layered fabric with a layer of mesh on the outside, soft, lightweight, thanks to the great stretch, the bodycon dress is fit for most figures
The elegant party dresses are featuring off shoulder strapless top, ruffles tassel element, sleeveless, tight fitted, mini length, the open back design can show your charming curves

The strapless mini dress is great for party, wedding guest, graduation, evening, date night, club, homecoming, birthday, going out, cocktail, formal, daily, dinner, christmas, vacation, just pair with some simple accessories and heels for a stylish look
Machine or Hand Washable with Cold Water, No Bleach
